verses.name: John 6:37
verses.text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

verses.name: John 6:38
verses.text: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.

verses.name: John 6:39
verses.text: And this is the Father’s will which hath sent me, that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing, but should raise it up again at the last day.
